dict.acceptation: 海滩，海滨；岸上的沙子和卵石；
将…拖上岸；将滑艇拖到小屋前面的岸边；

sent.orig: Come along to the beach, beach, beach. Where the weather is great, great, great.
sent.trans: 到海滩上来吧，海滩，海滩。那里的天气很好，很好，很好。

sent.orig: A beach of historical interest is Cleopatra's Beach on Sedir Island, Turkey.
sent.trans: 一个有着历史影响的沙滩是土耳其瑟得尔岛上的克利奥帕特拉海滩。

sent.orig: The beach ball today was a great success, cheers are everywhere around the entire beach.
sent.trans: 今天的海滩舞会举办得很成功，整个海滩上欢声在在。

sent.orig: Our main products: beach chair (chair) beach bed folding tables and chairs tents portable travel supplies.
sent.trans: 永康市唐先特普户外用品厂主要产品与：沙滩椅（休闲椅），沙滩床，折叠桌椅，帐篷，便携式旅行用品等。

sent.orig: Look at the black stuff on the beach. The beach is so dirty!
sent.trans: 看海滩上那些黑糊糊的东西，海滩真脏。
